homeSlider.mainTitle: EXPLORE OUR LUXURY PROPERTIES IN THE UAE

artOfDetail.description: At Mohamad Kodmani Real Estate Brokers, we understand that true excellence lies in the meticulous attention to detail and the artistry of craftsmanship. Guided by a commitment to perfection, we believe in crafting not just homes but immersive experiences where every nuance is thoughtfully considered.

pillarsSection.heading: FROM CONCEPT TO COMPLETION: DEFINING OUR PILLARS

pillar1.title: Why Invest in Dubai?
pillar1.intro: Dubai is one of the strongest investment cities in the world and offers an ideal environment to grow your real estate wealth.
pillar1.point3: No taxes on income or real estate profits.
pillar1.point4: Option to obtain a Golden Visa with an investment of AED 2 million or more.
pillar1.point6: Growing global demand for Dubai property.

pillar2.title: What Is a Real Estate Portfolio?
pillar2.intro: Owning more than one property – both ready and off-plan – with the goal of building a strong, balanced real estate fortune.
pillar2.point1: Diversifies your income across multiple properties.
pillar2.point3: Maximises returns through rental income and capital appreciation.
pillar2.point4: We manage the entire portfolio for you, so your real estate wealth grows safely and smoothly.

pillar3.title: What Is Off-Plan Investment in Dubai?
pillar3.intro: Buying a property in its early stages, before or during construction, with flexible instalments paid directly to the developer.
pillar3.point1: Lower purchase price compared to ready properties.
pillar3.point2: Potential to realise profit at handover as the property value rises over time.
pillar3.point3: High payment flexibility with comfortable instalments and no need for bank financing.

brand.corporateTitle: Real Estate Consultant and Investment Expert

aboutHero.description1: Mohamad Kodmani is a real estate investment specialist in Dubai with a clear vision and a professional approach that combines innovation, experience, and precise analysis of market opportunities.
aboutHero.description2: His career spanning contracting, business development, and real estate investment has enabled him to help hundreds of investors make successful purchase decisions and build profitable real estate portfolios.

buildingExcellence.paragraph: At Mohamad Kodmani Real Estate Brokerage, we do not simply sell units; we design complete investment strategies. Every recommendation is based on transparent information, realistic market analysis and a clear plan that balances capital appreciation, rental income and risk. In just two years, our team has helped investors close more than AED 170 million in transactions with returns above 8% annually, by entering the right projects at the right time.

stats.label: Years of entrepreneurial and real estate experience.
Annual targeted returns for structured strategies.

aboutBuildingExcellence.heading: Real Estate Decisions That Build Wealth, Not Just Properties
aboutBuildingExcellence.lead: At Mohamad Kodmani Real Estate Brokerage, we do not simply sell units; we design complete investment strategies. Every recommendation is based on transparent information, realistic market analysis and a clear plan that balances capital appreciation, rental income and risk. In just two years, our team has helped investors close more than AED 170 million in transactions with returns above 8% annually, by entering the right projects at the right time.

experience.label: years
experience.description: Of entrepreneurial and real estate experience across multiple sectors.

volume.label: AED 170 M+
volume.description: Transaction volume closed for investors in just two years.

returns.description: Targeted annual returns on structured investment strategies with controlled risk.

services.title: What We Do for Our Investors
services.intro: At Mohamad Kodmani Real Estate Brokerage, we do much more than sell properties. We analyse your goals, design a clear strategy, and execute every step with you — from selecting the right project to handover, leasing, resale, and furnishing.

cards.title: Investment Advisory & Off-Plan Strategy
items: In-depth consultation to understand your capital, goals, and risk profile.
Selecting projects with the strongest growth potential in Dubai's key locations.
Short- and long-term investment planning backed by realistic market analysis.
Off-plan advisory: capital appreciation studies, payment plan design, and securing the best units before public launch.

cards.title: Portfolio Building & Property Management
items: Designing balanced portfolios that mix cash-flow properties with capital growth assets.
Combining ready units with off-plan projects to spread risk.
Property management and leasing: tenant sourcing, follow-up, and rent optimisation.
Full handling of maintenance, expenses, and regular performance reports for investors.

cards.title: Handover, Resale & Furnishing
items: Detailed snagging and handover service: inspecting the unit, detecting defects, and supervising corrections.
Preparing the property for leasing or resale with the right finishing and positioning.
Premium resale service: luxury marketing, serious buyer filtering, and selling at the right moment to maximise profit.
Furnishing & interior design for high-end units to support faster leasing and premium rental rates.

services.footer: With us, you gain a long-term investment partner who understands the Dubai market, reads its trends, and guides you toward the best possible results with the least possible risk.

aboutServices.sectionTitle: What We Do for Our Investors
aboutServices.intro: At Mohamad Kodmani Real Estate Brokerage, we do much more than sell properties. We analyse your goals, design a clear strategy, and execute every step with you — from selecting the right project to handover, leasing, resale, and furnishing.

points.p1: In-depth consultation to understand your capital, goals, and risk profile.
points.p2: Selecting projects with the strongest growth potential in Dubai's key locations.
points.p3: Short- and long-term investment planning backed by realistic market analysis.
points.p4: Off-plan advisory: capital appreciation studies, payment plan design, and securing the best units before public launch.

footer.text: With us, you gain a long-term investment partner who understands the Dubai market, reads its trends, and guides you toward the best possible results with the least possible risk.
footer.highlight: best possible results with the least possible risk

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: To build a strong, diversified real estate investment portfolio that delivers high, stable, and safe returns for our investors, and to become the first destination for anyone looking for reliable real estate opportunities in Dubai.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To build a sustainable working system that creates job opportunities for thousands of people, and to develop a new generation of entrepreneurs who contribute positively to society through responsible, well-planned real estate investments.

p1.title: Transparency
p1.text: Every number and every detail is clear, honest, and explained — so investors can make decisions with full confidence.

p2.title: Expertise & Commitment
p2.text: Decisions are built on continuous market monitoring, real data, and a genuine commitment to achieving the best outcomes for each investor.

p3.title: Results & Professionalism
p3.text: Our first goal is always to achieve the highest possible returns with the least possible risk, through professionally structured, numbers-driven portfolios.

2006.title: From Family Legacy to Construction
2006.description: Coming from a family with a strong background in contracting and real estate, Mohamad establishes Al Bairaq Contracting in Dubai and begins building his own track record in projects and execution.

2013.title: Expanding into the Beauty Sector
2013.description: He moves into business development in the beauty industry in Syria, gaining hands-on experience in brand building, operations, and customer-focused growth.

2016.title: Entrepreneurship in F&B
2016.description: Mohamad establishes and manages restaurants in Syria, strengthening his understanding of cashflow, daily operations, and risk management in competitive markets.

2023.title: Founding Mohamad Kodmani Real Estate Brokerage
2023.description: Drawing on years of experience in construction and entrepreneurship, he launches Mohamad Kodmani Real Estate Brokerage in Dubai, specialising in investment-focused real estate services.

2023_2025.title: Building Investor Portfolios in Dubai
2023_2025.description: In just two years, the company helps investors close more than AED 170 million in transactions with investment returns above 8%, focusing on smart off-plan opportunities, portfolio building, and full post-purchase services.
